name: Non-Payment Reason
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="nonpay_reason"
	label="Non-Payment Reason"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_nonpay_reason"
	sql_title_column="name"
	sql_title_key="guid"
	urlSelect="index.php?option=com_###component###&view=nonpay_reasons&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=nonpay_reason.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=nonpay_reason.edit&guid={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=guid"
	titleSelect="Select Non-Payment Reason"
	titleNew="New Non-Payment Reason"
	titleEdit="Edit No-pay Reason"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="true"
	edit="true"
	clear="true"
	required="false"
	class="input-large"
	description="The non-payment reason"
	hint="Select a Non-Payment Reason"
/>
